import React, { useState } from 'react'; const mainBg = { background: 'linear-gradient(to bottom, #2c466b 60%, #3e5c2c 100%)', minHeight: '100vh', color: '#fff', fontFamily: 'sans-serif', padding: '0', margin: '0', }; const cardStyle = { background: '#fff', color: '#2c466b', borderRadius: '10px', padding: '10px 20px', margin: '10px', minWidth: '80px', textAlign: 'center', fontWeight: 'bold', boxShadow: '0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)', }; const sectionTitle = { fontSize: '1.2em', fontWeight: 'bold', margin: '10px 0 5px 0', }; function App() { const [club, setClub] = useState({ name: 'BENIDORM', season: '2025/26', league: 'Tercera C', date: 'Ağu 2025', hfSonu: 5, lig: 5, money: 12000, kadro: 36, menajer: 37, antrenman: 37, altyapi: 35, kupalar: 0, basarildi: 1, taraftarMutlu: 97, baskanMutlu: 52, stadium: 'Stadyum', baskan: 'Başkan', matchResults: ['M', 'G', 'G', 'G', 'B', 'B'], nextMatch: 'Tercera C: Guijuelo (D)', }); const [showFixture, setShowFixture] = useState(false); const [showStandings, setShowStandings] = useState(false); const fixtureData = [ { hft: 0, rakip: 'DON BENITO (E)', a: 1, y: 2, result: 'M', crowd: 194, pos: 'HZR' }, { hft: 1, rakip: 'ZAMUDIO (D)', a: 1, y: 0, result: 'G', crowd: '-', pos: 5 }, { hft: 2, rakip: 'LEALTAD (E)', a: 2, y: 0, result: 'G', crowd: 439, pos: 3 }, { hft: 3, rakip: 'SANTA BRIGIDA (D)', a: 2, y: 2, result: 'B', crowd: '-', pos: 2 }, { hft: 4, rakip: 'LOJA (E)', a: 1, y: 1, result: 'B', crowd: 390, pos: 5 }, { hft: 5, rakip: 'GUIJUELO (D)', a: '-', y: '-', result: '', crowd: '-', pos: '-' }, // ... add more rows as needed ]; const getResultColor = (result) => { if (result === 'M') return '#c00'; if (result === 'G') return '#2c7b2c'; if (result === 'B') return '#b88c2c'; return '#ccc'; }; // Sample standings data const standingsData = [ { pos: 1, team: 'JAEN', O: 5, G: 4, B: 0, M: 1, A: 12, Y: 6, AV: 6, PN: 12, color: '#b88c2c' }, { pos: 2, team: 'CONQUENSE', O: 5, G: 4, B: 0, M: 1, A: 10, Y: 5, AV: 5, PN: 12, color: '#2c7b2c' }, { pos: 3, team: 'LAGUN ONAK', O: 5, G: 4, B: 0, M: 1, A: 7, Y: 3, AV: 4, PN: 12 }, { pos: 4, team: 'SAGUNTINO', O: 5, G: 2, B: 3, M: 0, A: 4, Y: 2, AV: 2, PN: 9 }, { pos: 5, team: 'CIUDAD REAL', O: 5, G: 3, B: 0, M: 2, A: 5, Y: 5, AV: 0, PN: 9 }, { pos: 6, team: 'LLOSETENSE', O: 5, G: 2, B: 2, M: 1, A: 6, Y: 4, AV: 2, PN: 8 }, { pos: 7, team: 'BENIDORM', O: 5, G: 2, B: 2, M: 1, A: 6, Y: 5, AV: 1, PN: 8, color: '#fff', textColor: '#2c466b' }, { pos: 8, team: 'OLOT', O: 5, G: 2, B: 2, M: 1, A: 4, Y: 3, AV: 1, PN: 8 }, { pos: 9, team: 'VILLARROBLED', O: 5, G: 2, B: 1, M: 2, A: 6, Y: 6, AV: 0, PN: 7 }, // ... add more teams as needed ]; return (
FOOTBALL CHAIRMAN
{club.name}
{club.season}  |  {club.league}  |  {club.date}
PARA
€{club.money.toLocaleString()}
{/* Standings Modal */} {showStandings && (
TERCERA C, HAFTA 5
{standingsData.map((row, idx) => ( ))}
# TAKIM O G B M A Y AV PN
{row.pos} {row.team} {row.O} {row.G} {row.B} {row.M} {row.A} {row.Y} {row.AV} {row.PN}
)} {/* Fixture Modal */} {showFixture && (
FİKSTÜRLER/SONUÇLAR
{fixtureData.map((row, idx) => ( ))}
hft Rakip A Y Sonuç Kalabalık Poz
{row.hft} {row.rakip} {row.a} {row.y} {row.result && ( {row.result} )} {row.crowd} {row.pos}
)}
KADRO
{club.kadro}
MENAJER
{club.menajer}
ANTRENMAN
{club.antrenman}
ALTYAPI
{club.altyapi}
KUPALAR
{club.kupalar}
BAŞARILDI
{club.basarildi}
REKORLAR
🏆
GEÇMİŞ
📈
TARAFTARLAR MUTLU MU?
{club.taraftarMutlu}% MENAJER
{club.baskanMutlu}% BAŞKAN
STADYUM
⚽
BAŞKAN
👔
{club.matchResults.map((result, idx) => { let bg = '#b88c2c'; if (result === 'M') bg = '#c00'; if (result === 'G') bg = '#2c7b2c'; return (
{result}
); })}
{club.nextMatch}
); } export default App;
